title: UK Coronavirus Data Supply
description_html:
An aggregated database of records relating to Covid-19 related deaths in the UK from a variety of sources. Scraped daily.

For details about how the data was obtained, see [ouseful-datasupply/uk-coronavirus-deaths](https://github.com/ouseful-datasupply/uk-coronavirus-deaths/)
source: Various sources: NHS, Public Health England, ONS

nhs_dailies_age.description_html: Daily deaths by age group (0-19, 20-39, 40-59, 60-79, 80+, TBC)
